name: Memochi - Dust
description:
What’s a MEMOCHI?

A “Memochi” is a collection of memories belonging to

a digital creature that is stored inside of an arcade cabinet.

This one comes with 100 animated memories that are

randomly showcased at the press of a single button. Experience 

their entire timeline from life to death through this machine!

(Look for the secret memory!)

ATTENTION: 

If you get the "Windows SmartScreen - Unknown Publisher" pop-up, simply click "more info" then "Run anyway". This happens early on because not enough people have downloaded the application. Hopefully this should go away later on!

Linux users: 

Incredibly sorry about the Linux version not working! This is my first time ever coding or uploading an interactive application of any sorts on the internet, so I suppose there's plenty of things to learn from this experience. For now, I'll just keep only the windows version up. To my understanding, you can still run it through Wine. Sincerest apologies for the trouble and thanks for bringing it to my attention!
